Course.Name: Foundations of Software
Course.Description: Focusing on a high level object oriented language (e.g., Java, C++), provides foundational study of algorithms, data structures, and programming systems in the context of information technology systems.
Course.Prerequisite: Knowledge of a high level programming language and consent of instructor
Course.Course-attributes: Exempt from 3peat processing, Exempt/Waive 6 drop process, CS Instruction Fee - G
